tool_description: An API showing all the latest Business News around the world.
name: Business Live
title: Business Live

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source News
api_list.description: Gets News about Business from a specific news resource.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://business-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/bbc"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "business-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://business-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "business-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Business News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all news about Business News from all over the world.
